overview: Bai Chen, the young master of the fox clan in Qingqiu, received advice from his aunt Bai Jiuyan and learned that he had never been able to ascend to immortality because he was rescued by a human being a thousand years ago. Now he can only find the offspring of that person to return his kindness. to fly to immortality. Bai Chen bid farewell to his aunt and came to the world, and started his journey of repaying his gratitude. However, he didn't know that a huge danger was coming quietly...
title: Liao Zhai's Male Fox 3: Longevity Tribulation
